page.title: 12Local Housing
page.content:
The area around Dovedale School for approximately 1 square kilometre is mainly residential housing.
There are areas which are terraced houses, but most of the houses are semi- detached.
In our area is part of Sefton Park. It is noticeable that the older houses by the park are much larger than newer modern houses.These houses are sub-let as flats, and a lot of them are in need of repair.
By the railway are the old workmen's houses,these are terraced and are made of sandstone, there is also the old village school.
